message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $100 for it. I hope this aligns with your expectations and allows us to proceed with the transaction.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $90? I believe this would be a fair compromise.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. Let me propose an alternative at $95. This still reflects the value of the product while allowing for a more flexible deal within your current budget.
